summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1947, for the improvement of McClellan Street, from the east margin of Mt. Baker Boulevard to the east margin of Mt. Rainier Drive; Mt. Rainier Drive, from the south margin of McClellan Street to the south margin of Ridgeway Place, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing side sewer connections, under Ordinance No. 20122, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
